Text.Desc: A bow that can be used to hunt distant targets.

Text.Name: Item_WeaponWoodBow
Text.Desc: A bow that can be used to hunt distant targets.

Text.Name: Item_WeaponKnife
Text.Desc: A single-edged sword that excels at slashing and chopping.

Text.Name: Item_WeaponLance
Text.Desc: A long spear that can effectively inflict piercing damage to one's inner organs.

Text.Name: Item_WeaponHalbert
Text.Desc: A heavy blunt weapon, its impact massive enough to break the enemy's bones and tendons.

Text.Name: Item_WeaponAxeRing
Text.Desc: An exotic weapon. Put it onto a boxing glove and it can be used to inflict a large number of wounds on the opponent very quickly.

Text.Name: SP_Sword1
Text.Desc: It is said that in the faraway land to the west, a warrior named Daraboomba used this sword to slay a powerful creature called "dragon". The whole sword is of crimson color as if it was bathed in dragon blood. When landing a hit with this sword, there is a chance of inflicting Heart Burn injury to the enemy.

Text.Name: SP_Sword2
Text.Desc: A plain wooden sword left by the Immortal Pearlwood. It looks nothing out of the ordinary, yet possesses the miraculous ability of summoning rain and wind.

Text.Name: SP_Sword3
Text.Desc: This sword is the keepsake of Wang Laoju, Sect Leader of the Future Tech. The presence of this sword represent the presence of Laoju himself. Holder of this sword can improve the morale of all employees, making them more willing to work.

Text.Name: SP_Sword4
Text.ThingName: ดาบฆ่ามังกร
Text.Desc: An extremely powerful sword, this is the one carried by the Dark Swordmaster from the ancient times.

Text.Name: SP_Bow1
Text.ThingName: ธนูล่าสัตว์
Text.Desc: Bow specifically designed for hunting animals. It uses special arrows that are coated with anesthetics and can't penetrate into skin, so it generally won't cause fatal injury.
